briefdescription.para: x component
y component
z component
w component 0 for vector 1 for point
r component

b component
a component

array of four floats mapped to the x,y,z,w components of the vector useful for openGL fv data types this is mapped as a union to the following m_x == m_openGL[0] m_y == m_openGL[1] m_z == m_openGL[2] m_w == m_openGL[3]

simplesect.para: I've made this public as some compilers automatically make the anonymous unions public whereas clang++ complains see this post http://jonmacey.blogspot.com/2011/03/anonymous-union-struct-weirdness.html

operator to multiply a vector by a matrix
accesor to the m_openGL matrix returns the address of the 0th element

simple Vector class for OpenGL graphics, contains overloaded operators for most math functions, including operators for manipulation by Point3 and Matrix has a simple union to allow data to be access as x,y,z,w or float[4] array
